title: WHEN IS THIS COMING OUT?!
body:
I found this picture...Too good.

I main swain and i was looking up fan art when i came across this.

When is this coming out riot?

If this skin does come out i think it would bring swain back to life...lets face it nobody plays him and hes good if u play right.

P.S. Thanks for all the comments ive never had a post that was this popular! :D

replies.body:
Except Dargon Mastah Swain doesn't really make any sense...?

Just wondering why.
You're playing a game where people die repeatedly over and over and don't suffer any physical or mental trauma. Making sense is a little bit outside of the realm of most video games.

I'm not talking about making sense for the real world, I'm talking about game-sense. I mean.. Swain doesn't really have any connections to dragons. Unless I missed something which would make me feel foolish.
And Nautilus is an astronaut? Urgot is actually a giant crab? Teemo is a badger astronaut super hero?

They'll sell Teemo as anything, dude. Naut as an astroNAUT works because pun and his floating/swimming animation.

I'm not saying it *shouldn't* be done. I don't have anything against a dargon mastah Swain. I just thought it was kinda random.

But if anyone can be a dargon mastah......... {{champion:74}}  next? C'mon, Riot, little dragon turrets? :D

No more random than Dragon Trainer Lulu I'd say. Besides, with the little bit of lore that we have between dragons and Runeterra, there is some hunting of them, which is how Prince Jarvan IV came across Shyvanna. So theoretically speaking there could be appropriate lore for Swain capturing and training dragons as a manner of gaining power. Sounds like a pretty Noxus thing to do.

I had another comment on my first post about Lulu, dunno if you saw it. I mean, Riot's always done random things for skins. So, Dargon Swain? Why not? My initial reaction was simple confusion.

I do like your analysis of the lore though, and dragons are pretty Noxus.
I was at that party Griftrix. And everyone was invited and so so chill.
Riot Girl = best poster on the forums

Yeah, skins are not cannon.  They can go against, reinvent, or just not make any lore sense at all.  It just depends on the skin goals.  Pool party?  You think that's a lore cannon thing? (incoming posts explaining how there was really a pool party on Runeterra where everyone was invited and chill).

I'm not sure that Astro Nautilus works because of a pun is a good argument.  That pun works in English, and I don't know how many other languages, but I'm betting not many.  Astro Nautilus works also because an astronaut suit is similar to a diving suit in form.
I'm a little bit confused. I think that I don't get the joke in "*Astro Nautilus*". I thought that it was just based on the resemblance and that's all.
Astronaut -> Astronaut Nautilus -> Astro-Nautilus
Ah, get it now.

You bring up a valid point, though I've heard of things having different names in different countries to still be punny. I don't play on servers of other languages, maybe the AstroNautilus skin has a different name there!

At any rate, I find it a very clever pun. Especially in English. :D
You meant "Diving suit" is similar to an astronaut suit, but I understand what you mean :)
Yeah, I totally did :)
Theres Dragon trainer Lulu. You can't seriously be questioning Dragon Master Swain

How exactly does it not make sense? I'm just wondering how you see it.

The way I see it: dragons are cool, and you can totally replace Swain's bird and bird form with dragons, a similar flighted beast. Just like in Dragon Tamer Lulu!
fair enough, I wasn't thinking about that! Also, considering your comment.. Swain would look pretty BA as a dargon.

hang on wtf is a dargon

this is the second time i have seen that not-word in the last week

dargons don't exist

Dargons. Dey B So Hax0rz Brah.

I dunno. A bunch of friends and I were making fun of Skyrim recently, and one of 'em said something about a Dargon Shout. I lol'd and thought 'dargon' was a funny word.
What about Suprise Party Fiddlesticks or Arcade Hecarim? Just cuz it doesn't make sense doesn't mean that its a bad skin or anything :3

*insert facepalm*

Guys. I didn't say it was a bad skin. I didn't understand 'why', at first. Didn't really process that 'why' is irrelevant when making skins. That's a good thing, too. Please, enough!

Why does noone read already existing threads? 

Here: http://community.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/fancreations/pxn9Hit8-skin-department-dragon-master-swain-has-being-on-your-radar-for-two-whole-years-now

And here in the old community forum: http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1158089 (Title of the thread "Swain, the Dragon Master"
This was actually a skin that was suggested I think some time in season 2 so my guess is that it was scrapped, but I could be wrong maybe we will get a red in here to comment.

I'm pretty sure that was a fan art drawing, which really means nothing about it's development.  And just because some people at Riot think it's a cool drawing, doesn't mean it will be produced.  You guys make way too many cool drawings for us to make them all into skins, and the people here also have cool drawings :).

Here is a link to what I think is the original source, via very little googling and no verification at all:

http://vegacolors.deviantart.com/art/Dragon-Master-Swain-298470219
-_- the fact that u didn't know about dragon master swain and u work at rito makes me worried that morello will keep his word cause he totally promised us this.
i think they should make this though :D

Morello Promised us.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=34582730#34582730

I Love this Idea and am Patiently waiting for the skin

look at the original thread on the forums by Neonir. he has like 20 Riot Posts on it.

Well Riot said they wanted to do it years ago but haven't said much since.

For anyone who doesn't know what he is talking about here is the original thread from 3 years ago.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1158089

Confirmation by Morello:

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?p=34582730#34582730

Seeing as Void Fizz was just recently previewed, I wouldn't be surprised if this is just still slowly creeping into the game, at the same rate my conveniently marked "For DM Swain" wad o' cash is gravitating towards the computer screen.
This is awesome. This so needs to be in live. Would buy it in an instant.
Morello DID actually confirm dragon master swain, but I don't know when it will come out. Could be a while.
{{champion:50}} dont even use him but i like

I don't even play Swain and I want this

I think I remember Morello or somebody saying they wanted to do this, but can't remember where I read this >.<
soon(tm)
